Text: What module in the Service Catalog application does an Administrator access to begin creating a new item?
Which is true regarding Knowledge Base ?

Answers.Text: In a Knowledge base, articles are grouped according to categories.
In a Knowledge base, articles are grouped according to users who created them.
In a Knowledge base, articles are grouped according to approval dates.
In a Knowledge base, articles are grouped according to their created dates.

wpProQuiz_correct: Answer: A. In a Knowledge base, articles are grouped according to categories.

Text: Which of the following statement is TRUE about sys_dictionary?

Answers.Text: sys_dictionary is a table where all the details about the fields are stored
sys_dictionary is a field and used for make field mandatory

wpProQuiz_correct: Answer: A. sys_dictionary is a table where all the details about the fields are stored

Text: Which of the below are "ServiceNow release cycle" types ?

Answers.Text: One record stored in the sys_user_group table; and, it's a collection of users who share a common purpose
Enables admins to set mandatory and read only states for fields and can enforce data consistency across applications. You can set import data as read only. e.x - user info
Feature release, patch release and hot fix

wpProQuiz_correct: The correct answer is: D. Feature release, patch release and hot fix

Text: To generate task based records through service request which is the correct option below ?
wpProQuiz_correct: A Record Producer is correct because it allows users to create task-based records through a service request. A Record Producer is essentially a form within ServiceNow that offers an alternative way to create records for a specific table. Users can complete the form to generate incident records, change requests, and so on, directly from the service catalog.

Text: Which of the following are a type of client scripts supported in ServiceNow ?
You will see a text area widget where you can add conditional expressions to your ACL. It is known as ?
Which of the following is true ?

Answers.Text: When moved from left to right slush bucket, referance fields get deleted
Deleted system tables will be created again during an instance upgrade

wpProQuiz_correct: Answer: A. System tables cannot be deleted

Text:
If the system administrator wants to modify the homepage, which of the following links on the page
indicates that this can be done ?
Out of the below listed applications, which will not run natively on smartphones ?
The baseline Service Catalog homepage contains links to which of the following components ?

Answers.Text: Record Producers, Order Guides, and Catalog Items
Order Guides, Catalog Items, and Workflows
Order Guides, Item Variables, and Workflows
Record Producers, Order Guides, and Item Variables

wpProQuiz_correct: The correct option is A. Record Producers, Order Guides, and Catalog Items because the baseline Service Catalog homepage is designed to provide users with the primary interface for ordering items within the catalog. Here's a brief explanation of each component:

Text: In a workflow, what is the workflow timeline ?

Answers.Text: Defines unique key for record. If record found, import will update the record. If not found, import will create a new record.
Shows the progress of a workflow. It provides a complete time-based display of activities associated with workflow context.
An automation block such as approvals, conditions, notifications, tasks, timers and utilities

wpProQuiz_correct: Answer: B. Shows the progress of a workflow. It provides a complete time-based display of activities associated with workflow context.

Text: What does a request number in Service Catalog represent ?

Answers.Text: It represents the individual item in the order.
It represents the task to complete.

wpProQuiz_correct: Answer: A. It represents the order number

Text: Which of the following concepts are associated with the ServiceNow CMDB ? (Choose four.)
What defines conditions that are evaluated against users to determine which users can access Service Catalog items ?
An outbound SOAP message is defined. Which function can invoke the SOAP message ?
Which of the following is used to initiate a flow ?
Which table defines what conditions trigger an SLA ?
Which tables captures information related to workflow versions ?

Which one of the following statements describes the contents of the Configuration Management Database (CMDB) ?
A. The CMDB contains data about tangible and intangible business assets
B. The CMDB contains the Business Rules that direct the intangible, configurable assets used by a company
C. The CMDB archives all Service Management PaaS equipment metadata and usage statistics
D. The CMDB contains ITIL process data pertaining to configuration items
wpProQuiz_correct: A. The CMDB contains data about tangible and intangible business assets

Text: On any ServiceNow instance, which of the following allows a user to edit field values in a list without opening the form ?
Which of the following can be performed by inbound email action ?
wpProQuiz_correct: Answer: A. Create or update task record

Text: Which of the following can be customized through the Basic Configuration UI 16 module? (Choose three.)
Which of the following statement describes the purpose of an Order Guide in ServiceNow platform ?

Answers.Text: Order Guide provide the ability to order multiple, related items as one request
Order Guide provide a list of guidelines for Administrators on how to set up item variables
Order Guides restrict the number of items in an order to only one item per request

wpProQuiz_correct: Answer: A. Order Guide provide the ability to order multiple, related items as one request

Text: Regarding update sets, Customer updates/payload is stored in _ table
Which one of the following is true characteristics for workflows in service catalog ?

Answers.Text: The start & end activities in workflows can be changed.
Workflows can have a maximum of five rounds of approval actions.
Only one rollback activities is allowed in a workflow
Workflows can have a multiple rounds of approval actions.

wpProQuiz_correct: Answer: D. Workflows can have a multiple rounds of approval actions.

Text: What are the UI components of a homepage ?

Answers.Text: Banner, Content pane and Application Navigator
Banner, Content pane, Header and Application Navigator
Banner, Content pane, Header, Footer and Application Navigator

Text: Which of the following contains tabs for accessing workflows that are being edited or created ?
What defines how departments work together to meet the service level requirements documented in an SLA ?
Button, Related Links and Context Menu are part of ?
Is it true that all users can manage and setup import sets ?
What are two of the settings that can be made in the contextual security manager ?

Answers.Text: Ability to disable applications and to set the maximum notification size.
Ability to change release dates and manage group personnel.
Ability to specify the attachment file types.
Ability to set the maximum attachment size.
Ability to change release dates and restrict automatic notifications.

wpProQuiz_correct: A. Ability to disable applications and to set the maximum notification size

Text: Variable sets can be used in which of the below options ? Choose all that apply.
wpProQuiz_correct: Answer: A. Record Producer, B. Order Guides, and C. Catalog Items

Which of the following statement is TRUE for a field on an audited table?

wpProQuiz_correct: Answer: C. Table Creation and D. Field Creation

Text: Where will a user find option to edit a list in ServiceNow ?
Personlizing a list for an individual user will not affect other users list layout
Groups are stored in which table
Which one statement correctly describes Access Control rule evaluation ?

Answers.Text: If more than one rule applies to a row, the older rule is evaluated first
Rules are evaluated using roles. The role with the most permissions evaluates the rules first
If a row level rule and a field level rule exist, both rules must be true before an operation is allowed
Rules are evaluated from the general to the specific, so a table rule must be active to continue

wpProQuiz_correct: Answer: C. If a row level rule and a field level rule exist, both rules must be true before an operation is allowed

Text: Knowledge process consists of which of the below components ?

Answers.Text: document creation, approval and review from SMEs and publishing
document creation, approval and review from SMEs

wpProQuiz_correct: Answer: A. document creation, approval and review from SMEs and publishing
